fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Deathmatch, Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, Dragon's Bane

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Crimson Witch of Flames <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Pyro DMG Bonus +15%.
• Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Shimenawa's Reminiscence <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• ATK +18%.
• When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charge/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.
